name: Beast Master
description: Beast Masters bond with a beast companion that fights alongside them.

3.name: Ranger's Companion
3.description: Gain a beast companion that obeys your commands and acts on your initiative.

3.name: Primal Companion
3.description: (Optional) Summon a primal beast spirit and command it using a bonus action; it can be resummoned after a long rest.

7.name: Exceptional Training
7.description: When the beast doesn't attack, you can command it as a bonus action to Dash, Disengage, or Help, and its attacks count as magical.

11.name: Bestial Fury
11.description: When you command the beast to Attack, it can make two attacks or use its Multiattack.

15.name: Share Spells
15.description: When you cast a spell targeting yourself, it also affects your beast companion within 30 feet.
